per_frame_init_1=state_rot
per_frame_init_2=state = 0;
per_frame_init_3=xs = 0;
per_frame_init_4=xy = 0;
per_frame_1=bass_clip = above(bass_att,bass_clip)*2 + (1-above(bass_att,bass_clip))*((bass_clip-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_2=basstime = basstime + (bass_att*0.09)*bass_att*0.25 + time*0.1;
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=//state machine for rotation
per_frame_5=state_rot = state_rot + equal(bass_clip,2)*9.48;
per_frame_6=state_rot = if(above(state_rot,9.48),-4.74 , state_rot);
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=rot = state_rot;
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=//state machine for shape tracking
per_frame_11=state = state + equal(bass_clip,2);
per_frame_12=state = if(above(state,4), 0, state);
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=//add bouns on beat
per_frame_15=xs = xs + 0.1*equal(2,bass_clip);
per_frame_16=ys = ys + 0.1*equal(2,bass_clip);
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=//state 0 elipse
per_frame_19=xs = xs + (equal(0,state))*atan(bass_time*4)*0.1;
per_frame_20=ys = ys + (equal(0,state))*cos(bass_time*4)*0.1;
per_frame_21=
per_frame_22=//state 1 diag
per_frame_23=xs = xs + (equal(1,state))*cos(bass_time*4)*0.1;
per_frame_24=ys = ys + (equal(1,state))*cos(bass_time*4)*0.1;
per_frame_25=
per_frame_26=//state 2 -circle
per_frame_27=xs = xs + (equal(2,state))*cos(bass_time*4)*0.1;
per_frame_28=ys = ys + (equal(2,state))*sin(bass_time*4)*0.1;
per_frame_29=
per_frame_30=//state 3 parametric arc
per_frame_31=xs = xs + (equal(3,state))*cos(bass_time*2)*0.1;
per_frame_32=ys = ys + (equal(3,state))*cos(bass_time*4)*0.1;
per_frame_33=
per_frame_34=//state 4 arc
per_frame_35=xs = xs + (equal(4,state))*atan(bass_time*4)*0.1;
per_frame_36=ys = ys + (equal(4,state))*cos(bass_time*3)*0.1;
per_frame_37=
per_frame_38=ib_r = ib_r + 0.5*sin(time*0.899);
per_frame_39=ib_g = ib_g + 0.5*sin(time*0.687);
per_frame_40=ib_b = ib_b + 0.5*sin(time*1.225);
per_frame_41=
per_frame_42=//project and publish
per_frame_43=q1 = 0.5 + 0.4*sin(xs);
per_frame_44=q2 = 0.5 + 0.4*sin(ys);
per_frame_45=
per_frame_46=q3 = 0.5 + 0.4*sin(xs + 1.5707);
per_frame_47=q4 = 0.5 + 0.4*sin(ys + 1.5707);
per_frame_48=q5 = basstime;
per_frame_49=
per_pixel_1=zoom = 0.74 + bass_att*0.14 + equal(q5,2)*0.5;
per_pixel_2=
per_pixel_3=rot = -4.74;
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=dx = 1 + (q1-0.5)*0.1*x*rad;
per_pixel_6=dy = 1 + (q2- 0.5)*0.1*y*rad;
per_pixel_7=
per_pixel_8=sx = 1 + (q1-0.5)*0.1*x;
per_pixel_9=sy = 1 + (q2-0.5)*0.1*x;
